Main.content: I've been thinking about this world.
The island. The trees. The water.
It seems to be made up of lots and lots of this one simple substance.
And each of these is called a "pixel".
So that means each object is just an arrangment of pixels right?
And each separate object is really just a pattern-
within this continuous array of pixels.
Could it then be that objects are just a mental construct?
Are they just a tool for making sense of this chaotic mess of pixels?
